means: （机票，旅馆订房的） 有效期

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"有益于，有益"之意。
means: avail ：较文雅，常见于历史小说、演说或讲道中，较少用于日常话语，侧重功效或效力。
benefit ：通常既可指个人情况(如身体、智力或精神状态等)的好转或改善，又可指对实现某个目标等带来的好处。
profit ：着重于物质方面的受益，常用于财富或知识等方面的得益。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"使用，应用"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: use, apply, employ, utilize, avail, exploit
means: use ： 普通用词，着重为达到某一目的而利用某人或某物。
apply ： 指将一事物运用于另一事物之上以发挥其有效作用。
employ ： 指使用处于消极状态或未被用过的人或物，可以与use换用，但强调进行选择、充分利用。
utilize ： 侧重有利可图或能达到某一实际目的。书面用词。
avail ： 通常指使用手边或就近的人或物以有利于自己。

sentence.Network_en: His efforts were to no avail.
I apologized repeatedly, but to little avail.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一再道歉，但丝毫没有奏效。

sentence.Network_en: We tried to keep him alive but to no avail.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们全力抢救他,但却徒劳无功.

phrase.cizu_name: avail someone nothing of little (或 no) avail to li

jx.jx_en_mean: (archaic)(of an action) be of no help at all to someone
not very (or not at all) effective or successful
with little (or no) success or benefit
jx.jx_cn_mean: 几乎（或根本）毫无作用；无助

lj.lj_ly: he tried to get his work recognized, but to little avail.
lj.lj_ls: 他试图使自己的工作得到认可，但却几乎毫无作用。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from obsolete vail 'be of use or value' (apparently on the pattern of pairs such as amount, mount), from Old French valoir, from Latin valere 'be strong, be of value'

entry.def: If you do something to no avail or to little avail, what you do fails to achieve what you want.

example.ex: His efforts were to no avail...
I apologized repeatedly, but to little avail.
example.tran: 我一再道歉，但丝毫没有奏效。

entry.def: If you avail yourself of an offer or an opportunity, you accept the offer or make use of the opportunity.

example.ex: Guests should feel at liberty to avail themselves of your facilities.
example.tran: 宾客们应该可以随意使用你们的各种设施。

sentences.sentence: "He availed himself of the available resources"

means.word_mean: 2. be of use to, be useful to;

sentences.sentence: "It will avail them to dispose of their booty"
"She helped herself to some of the office supplies"

auth_sentence.content: Nor aught the warrior's thundering mace avail'd.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor aught the warrior's thundering mace avail'd.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor aught the warrior's thundering mace avail'd.

auth_sentence.content: Words avail very little with me, young man.
auth_sentence.res_content: Words avail very little with me, young man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Words avail very little with me, young man.

auth_sentence.content: But to little avail, China's delegate countered.
auth_sentence.res_content: But to little avail, China's delegate countered.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But to little avail, China's delegate countered.

abbreviation.mean_cn: 有用［效］的, 可获得［提供］的

Sentence.sentence: This enables him to reinterpret British cuisine depending on what is avail able in the local markets.

sentences.en: We tried to keep him alive but to no avail.
sentences.cn: 我们全力抢救他, 但却徒劳无功。

means.word_mean: 有用于, 有益于, 有助于

sentences.en: All his efforts did not avail.
sentences.cn: 他做的所有的这些努力都是没有用的。

jushi.english: The murderer's entreaties for mercy availed to nothing.
jushi.chinese: 无人理会杀人犯的求饶。

jushi.english: Money does not avail on a desert island.
jushi.chinese: 金钱在荒岛上没有用处。

jushi.english: Talk will avail little without work.
jushi.chinese: 光说不做没有什么用处。
